text: 1/4 cup preserved lemon juice, or 1/3 cup of regular lemon juice
label: ingredient

text: Place cilantro, parsley, and garlic in the workbowl of a food processor fitted with a steel blade. Pulse until all ingredients are finely chopped, stopping to scrape down sides of bowl as necessary.
label: step

text: Add preserved lemon juice, paprika, cumin, cayenne, and saffron and pulse to combine.
label: step

text: With motor running, drizzle olive through feed tube. Process until sauce is uniform. Use immediately or transfer to an airtight container and store in refrigerator for up to 2 days.
label: step
